title: [Critique] Unnamed clean sans serif
content:
Hi!

First post here, jumping right into it.

Would you care to throw a look at a draft of my latest project.  
My goal is a super clean modern sans serif with minimal flourishes.

Any input is welcome!

Cheers!  
/C
